USE logical_DWH_nyc_taxi;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.partitioning_trip_data
    @year VARCHAR(5),
    @month VARCHAR(3)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_statement NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_statement NVARCHAR(MAX);

    -- Drop statement to remove the existing partition table if it exists
    SET @drop_statement = 'IF OBJECT_ID(''silver.part_trip_data_' + @year + '_' + @month + ''') IS NOT NULL ' +
                          'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.part_trip_data_' + @year + '_' + @month + ';';

    PRINT(@drop_statement)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_statement;

    -- Create statement to create the new partition table
    SET @create_statement = 
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.part_trip_data_' + @year + '_' + @month + ' ' +
        'WITH ( ' +
        '    LOCATION = ''silver_layer/partitioning_trip_data/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''', ' +
        '    DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS, ' +
        '    FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file ' +
        ') AS ' +
        'SELECT VendorID ,
        lpep_pickup_datetime ,
        lpep_dropoff_datetime ,
        store_and_fwd_flag ,
        RatecodeID ,
        PULocationID ,
        DOLocationID ,
        passenger_count ,
        trip_distance ,
        fare_amount ,
        extra ,
        mta_tax ,
        tip_amount ,
        tolls_amount ,
        ehail_fee ,
        improvement_surcharge ,
        total_amount ,
        payment_type ,
        trip_type ,
        congestion_surcharge 
         FROM bronze.view_partition_tripdata ' +
        'WHERE year = ''' + @year + ''' ' +
        'AND month = ''' + @month + ''';';


    PRINT(@create_statement)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_statement;
END;
